title: Square Root of a Number
text: if $$n^2=m$$, then $$n$$ is the square root of $$m$$.
speech: if  n squared is equal to, m , then  n  is the square root of  m .
pacedSpeech: if   n squared is equal to, m
is the square root of   m

title: Example Calculation
text: $${25}^2=625$$, so $$25$$ is the square root of $$625$$. In equation form, $$\sqrt{625}=25$$.
speech: 25 squared is equal to 625 , so  25  is the square root of  625 . In equation form,  the square root of 625 is equal to 25 .
pacedSpeech: . In equation form,   the square root of 625 is equal to 25

title: Opposite of a Square Root
text: $$-\sqrt{n}$$ means "the opposite of the square root of n." For example, $$-\sqrt{625}=-25$$.
speech: minus the square root of n  means "the opposite of the square root of n." For example, , negative the square root of 625 is equal to negative 25 .
pacedSpeech: minus the square root of n
means "the opposite of the square root of n." For example,  , negative the square root of 625 is equal to negative 25
